content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Vaughan uses poetic elements and techniques to convey the speaker’s complex ideas about the connection between the spiritual and material worlds.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Vaughan uses poetic elements and techniques to convey the speaker’s complex ideas about the connection between the spiritual and material worlds.

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
